dct_title_s: Solomon having built the temple of Jerusalem dedicates it to the Lord
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Features illustrations of structures and people.
"Vol. II. 2.d Gath. Ff." -- bottom right corner ; "P. 735" -- top right corner.
